messages.message: @Jessica @hannah Do we support configuring webhooks in the UI for app runs, or just for deployments?
(Or, in other words, do we need to hold onto the `webhook_config` parameter)
I think app runs too. People should really be using notifications configured in deployments though, not webhooks, so maybe we should just go ahead and hide that in the docs
I’m good with hiding the parameter if I have official approval (I have no clue whatsoever if customers will miss it)
Will let Jessica be the final reviewer for the first one. The second one LGTM.
